settings.title: Why put all that effort?
settings.text: Apricoat firmly believes in the importance of sustainable, eco-friendly products for a better, greener planet. We recognize the urgent need to address environmental challenges and take responsibility for our impact. By prioritizing sustainability, we strive to minimize our carbon footprint, reduce waste, and preserve natural resources. We understand that every step towards eco-consciousness matters and can contribute to a healthier planet for future generations. Through our commitment to sustainable practices, we aim to inspire others and be part of the global movement towards a more sustainable and environmentally conscious future. Together, we can make a significant difference in creating a greener and more sustainable world.

settings.title: Joining Forces for a Sustainable Future
settings.text: we firmly believe that collaboration with organizations committed to eco-friendly and sustainable actions is the key to making a meaningful change in reducing humanity's footprint on the planet.

settings.title: Importance of Sustainable Materials
settings.text: Using recycled sustainable materials is crucial to combat fast fashion and its negative impacts. By opting for high-quality, eco-friendly materials, we reduce waste, promote durability, and contribute to a more sustainable and responsible fashion industry.

settings.title: Operational impact
settings.text: Utilizing green shipping and green warehouses operations & practices is crucial to reduce carbon emissions and preserve our oceans. By adopting sustainable maintenance & shipping solutions, we can minimize the environmental impact and contribute to a cleaner and healthier planet.

settings.title: Sustainable, High-end gear to endless opportunities.

settings.text: Reducing carbon emissions by providing eco-friendly and sustainable shipping solutions, contributing to a greener and more environmentally conscious shipping industry.
Dedicated to global reforestation by planting trees, supporting local communities, and restoring forests, aiming to combat deforestation, promote biodiversity, and mitigate climate change.
Developing advanced technologies to remove plastic waste from the oceans, aiming to clean up and prevent further pollution, protecting marine life and ecosystems.
actively working to protect and conserve endangered species and their habitats through advocacy, education, and conservation initiatives, ensuring their survival for future generations.

works to protect and conserve rhinoceros populations through initiatives such as anti-poaching efforts, habitat preservation, and community education, ensuring the survival of these magnificent creatures.

settings.title: Our 'Saving the planet' partners
settings.sub_title: Organization which make the extra mile for leaving no footprint

settings.title: 100% RECYCLED
settings.text: Our jackets are crafted using the equivalent of 300 recycled plastic bottles, contributing to a cleaner planet. We prioritize certified materials, repurposed resources, and green technologies to minimize our environmental impact.

settings.title: Alternative Down
settings.text: we prioritize animal-friendly and sustainable practices by using alternative down for our jackets. Upholding our eco-friendly values, we believe in minimizing harm to animals and promoting ethical manufacturing. By choosing alternative down, we contribute to a more compassionate and environmentally conscious fashion industry. BTW, in case you wandered, its lighter, warmer & super soft. we really don't see any reason to use any other material :)

settings.title: We'd love to hear from you
settings.text: Eco-friendly organization? Ideas for sustainable acts? question? talk to us, we are always happy to learn or explain.
